bropals.lib.simplegame.gui

Class GuiText

  • java.lang.Object
    • bropals.lib.simplegame.gui.GuiElement
      • bropals.lib.simplegame.gui.GuiText

  • public class GuiText
extends GuiElement
    A GUI element that displays some text. When word wrap is enabled, the GuiText will attempt to draw all text inside of its box. If there is not enough space, then it will continue drawing at the width of the GuiText.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • GuiText

        public GuiText(java.lang.String text,
       int x,
       int y,
       int w,
       int h)
        Creates a GuiText object to display text. Word wrap mode is on by default; default color is Color.BLACK.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to display
        x - the top-left corner's X position of the GuiText's box
        y - the top-left corner's Y position of the GuiText's box
        w - the width of the GuiText box
        h - the height of the GuiText

      • GuiText

        public GuiText(java.lang.String text,
       int x,
       int y,
       int w,
       int h,
       java.awt.Font font)
        Creates a GuiText object to display text. Word wrap mode is on by default; default color is Color.BLACK.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to display
        x - the top-left corner's X position of the GuiText's box
        y - the top-left corner's Y position of the GuiText's box
        w - the width of the GuiText box
        h - the height of the GuiText
        font - the font that this GuiText will use

      • GuiText

        public GuiText(java.lang.String text,
       int x,
       int y,
       int w,
       int h,
       boolean wordWrap)
        Creates a GuiText object to display text. Word wrap mode is on by default; default color is Color.BLACK.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to display
        x - the top-left corner's X position of the GuiText's box
        y - the top-left corner's Y position of the GuiText's box
        w - the width of the GuiText box
        h - the height of the GuiText
        wordWrap - the initial word wrap state of this GuiText

      • GuiText

        public GuiText(java.lang.String text,
       int x,
       int y,
       int w,
       int h,
       java.awt.Font font,
       java.awt.Color textColor)
        Creates a GuiText object to display text. Word wrap mode is on by default; default color is Color.BLACK.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to display
        x - the top-left corner's X position of the GuiText's box
        y - the top-left corner's Y position of the GuiText's box
        w - the width of the GuiText box
        h - the height of the GuiText
        font - the font that this GuiText will use
        textColor - the text color that this GuiText will use
